name: Couchsurfing cannot be blamed for disputes you have with other users

tosdr.tldr: Because their Services are merely a platform, in the event that you have a dispute with one or more members, you release them (and their officers, directors, members, employees, agents and affiliates) from claims, demands and damages [...]
